example.parse: (S (CONJ و) (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS ايقن) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM الفلسطينيون)) (SBAR (SUB_CONJ ان) (S (NP-SBJ (PRON_3MP هم)) (ADJP-PRD (ADJP (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM ملحقون)) (CONJ و) (ADJP (ADJ+NSUFF_MASC_PL_NOM تابعون) (PP (PREP ل) (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_DEF_GEN دولة) (NP (NOUN_PROP+CASE_DEF_ACC اسرائيل)))))) (PP-MNR (PREP ك) (SBAR-NOM (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (PP-PRD (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN السابق))) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)))))))) (PUNC .))

arg.g: that they are attached to and affiliated to the State of Israel

example.arg: أنهم ملحقون و تابعون لدولة أسرائيل
